<< rem elementary functions reshape >>

repmat

Replicate and tile an array.

Syntax

R = repmat(A, m)
R = repmat(A, m, n)
R = repmat(A, m, n, p …)
R = repmat(A, [m n])
R = repmat(A, [m n p …])

Input argument

A

an array.

m, n, p …

a value: integer

Output argument

R

result array form by tiling.

Description

repmat repeats matrix or N-D array.

Examples

repmat(1:5, 2)


repmat(1:5, [2 3])


repmat(1:5, [2 3 4])

See also

reshape.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
